name: Classic Mysore Biryani
description: Mysore style biryani is truly a delight to your taste buds with rich flavours and yet subtle. It's time to experience this wonderful curation handcrafted by our biryani heroes with premium ingredients like cold pressed oil, 18 months aged rice, organic vegetables, freshly pound secret masala and of course the traditional style of cooking.

itemObject.itemdescription: Ditch the decision fatigue - we've got your complete feast covered!   Choose your favourite Biriyaani, from our range of Cassic Mysore, Epic Bangalore, Hyderabadi or Chicken 65 Biryani and we will make it even more exciting by adding some Kababs to the box.

name: Epic Bangalore Biryani
description: Dum cooked to perfection, a time honored tradition, handcrafted  by our biryani heroes ensuring each fluffy grain of rice is infused with aromatic spices. We at local heros make this biryani tastier and healthier by using finest premium ingredients like cold-pressed groundnut oil, 18-month aged Seeraga Samba rice, organic vegetables, and  freshly pounded masala.

itemObject.itemdescription: Ditch the decision fatigue - we've got your complete feast covered!   Choose your favourite Biriyaani, from our range of Cassic Mysore, Epic Bangalore, Hyderabadi or Chicken 65 Biryani and we will make it even more exciting by adding some Kababs to the box.

name: Family Biryani Feast
description: A family that eats together stays together! Serves 4 - 5 People Enjoy your family time with our irresistible range of Biryani and kababs. Choose from our Classic,Epic or Gen-Z biriyaani and we will pack it up with a box of Kababs. Deal :- + Biryani rice (1.5 Kgs Cooked rice) +Biriyaani chicken ( 15 Pieces) +Chicken Kabab ( 15 Pieces) +Made to Order

name: Ghee Rice with Chicken Keema
description: Indulge in the rich and comforting flavors of Ghee Rice. This classic South Indian dish features fluffy, aromatic rice cooked in uthukuli ghee. Ghee Rice is served as a versatile accompaniment to various curries, Keema, and chicken gojju. With its simple yet satisfying taste, Ghee Rice is a beloved staple food by many.

name: Hyderabadi Biryani
description: This Nizami biryani is made just the way the Hyderabadi Nizam's Khansama would make it for the Royals using Nizami tradition and time-honored methods. We at Local Heros make this biryani tastier and healthier by using finest premium ingredients like cold-pressed groundnut oil, 18-month aged Basmati rice,organic vegetables, and  freshly pounded masala. Each mouthful is a historical and flavorful journey fit for a king.

name: Paneer 65 Biryani
description: Taste a fiery twist on the classic biryani with our Paneer 65 Biryani. Crispy, flavorful paneer cubes, marinated in a spicy blend of spices are perfectly combined with our aromatic veg biryani rice. Made with premium ingredients like cold pressed oil, 18 months aged rice, organic vegetables, freshly pound secret masala and of course the traditional style of cooking. Every bite is a burst of flavor, with the spicy kick of the Paneer 65 complementing the rich, fragrant rice.

name: Anda Masti
description: Anda Masti is a mouth-watering egg-based dish that bursts with flavour, a symphony of spices and aromatic herbs come together to create a taste sensation that will leave you craving for more. name: Chicken Gojju
description: Experience the authentic taste of Karnataka with our Chicken Gojju. This flavorful curry boasts a rich gravy infused with a perfect blend of spices. Our Chicken Gojju is a true culinary delight that captures the essence of South Indian cuisine.

name: Aloo Chicken Curry
description: Our Aloo Chicken Curry is a timeless comfort food, where tender chicken and fluffy potatoes come together in a rich, aromatic gravy. name: Aloo Matar
description: Our Aloo Matar is a comforting and flavorful dish, a perfect blend of tender potatoes and green peas in a rich, creamy gravy. Infused with a delicate balance of aromatic spices, this vegetarian delight is a culinary masterpiece, a timeless classic that will leave you craving for more.

name: Paneer Keema
description: Paneer Keema is a flavorful Indian dish that combines the richness of paneer (cottage cheese) and aroma of spices. The paneer is typically marinated in spices and cooked until tender, while the keema is sautéed until browned. The two ingredients are then combined and simmered in a rich and aromatic gravy, often flavored with onions and tomatoes. Paneer Keema is a hearty and satisfying dish that can be enjoyed as a main course.

name: Palak Paneer
description: Palak Paneer is a popular North Indian vegetarian dish made with spinach (palak) and cottage cheese (paneer). The spinach is cooked down into a creamy, green gravy, and then the paneer cubes are added and simmered until coated in the flavorful sauce. Palak Paneer is often served with rice, roti, or naan. The combination of the earthy spinach and the tangy paneer creates a delicious and satisfying meal.

itemObject.itemdescription: Ditch the decision fatigue - we've got your complete feast covered!   Choose your favourite Biriyaani, from our range of Cassic Mysore, Epic Bangalore, Hyderabadi or Chicken 65 Biryani and we will make it even more exciting by adding some Kababs to the box.

name: Anda Biryani
description: Our Anda Masti Biryani features tender, boiled or fried eggs nestled amidst fragrant biryani rice. Each bite is a delightful surprise as the savory egg complements the rich and flavorful rice. Our Anda Masti Biryani is a must-try for egg lovers and biryani enthusiasts alike prepared with premium ingredients like cold pressed oil, 18-months aged Seeraga Samba rice, organic vegetables and freshly pounded masala.
